abstract: With the explosion of digital data, statisticians can earn $125,000 in their first year after getting a doctorate.
snippet: With the explosion of digital data, statisticians can earn $125,000 in their first year after getting a doctorate.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  At Harvard, Carrie Grimes majored in anthropology and archaeology and ventured to places like Honduras, where she studied Mayan settlement patterns by mapping where artifacts were found. But she was drawn to what she calls “all the computer and math stuff” that was part of the job.

headline.main: For Today’s Graduate, Just One Word: Statistics
headline.print_headline: For Today’s Graduate, Just One Word: Statistics

abstract: Why would AT&T care? Because of those free text messages and cheap international calls, of course. If these apps became popular, AT&T’s revenue could take a serious hit.
snippet: Why would AT&T care? Because of those free text messages and cheap international calls, of course. If these apps became popular, AT&T’s revenue could take a serious hit.

headline.main: Is Google Voice a Threat to AT&T?
